item.title: പ്രവർത്തന വർഷാരംഭം (The New Year of Activity)
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: The young missionaries of the Nedungapra branch enthusiastically started the new year of activity with the desire to give good to others and eagerness to follow in the footsteps of […]
item.content:encoded: The young missionaries of the Nedungapra branch enthusiastically started the new year of activity with the desire to give good to others and eagerness to follow in the footsteps of Christ and to become the gospel.

item.title: Executive Committee
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: The Executive Committee, headed by Branch President Amalekh Biju, discussed the plans for the new year online and decided to move forward with vigor.
item.content:encoded: The Executive Committee, headed by Branch President Amalekh Biju, discussed the plans for the new year online and decided to move forward with vigor.

item.title: World Environment Day
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: As part of the Environment Day celebrations, the children were encouraged to plant tree saplings in their homes to make them aware of the importance of this day and the […]
item.content:encoded: As part of the Environment Day celebrations, the children were encouraged to plant tree saplings in their homes to make them aware of the importance of this day and the children took part in the tree planting publicity campaign.

item.title: Diocesan Council and Annual Inauguration of the Year
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: Cardinal Mar George Alencherry officially inaugurated the Year of Action in the presence of His Holiness the Blessed Bishops, Mar George Madathikandathil and Mar Chacko Thottumarickal. On this occasion, Mar […]
item.content:encoded:
Cardinal Mar George Alencherry officially inaugurated the Year of Action in the presence of His Holiness the Blessed Bishops, Mar George Madathikandathil and Mar Chacko Thottumarickal.

On this occasion, Mar George Alencherry launched a digital magazine covering the diocesan activities.

Mar George Madathikandathil inaugurated the conference and Mar Chacko Thottumarickal delivered the blessing speech.

The meeting was attended by 14 office bearers and branch members.

item.title: Feast of St. Mariam Thresia Chiramel
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: On the occasion of the feast of St. Mary Thresia, the mediator of the families, a poster containing the words of holiness was presented to the CML group and the […]
item.content:encoded: On the occasion of the feast of St. Mary Thresia, the mediator of the families, a poster containing the words of holiness was presented to the CML group and the children were asked to pray for the intercession of holiness.

item.title: Feast of The Sacred Heart of Jesus
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra

item.title: Feast of the Immaculate Heart of the Blessed Mother
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra

item.title: Branch Inauguration
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: The Honorable Vicar inaugurated the CML branch and marked the beginning of this year of operation. The office bearers were not elected as there was an instruction that new office […]
item.content:encoded:
The Honorable Vicar inaugurated the CML branch and marked the beginning of this year of operation.

The office bearers were not elected as there was an instruction that new office bearers could be elected after the transfer of the Vicars.

item.title: Praveshanolsavam : Online Catechism
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: On the special occasion of Covid, the children started catechism classes online and the children’s praveshanolsavam was held beautifully
item.content:encoded: On the special occasion of Covid, the children started catechism classes online and the children’s praveshanolsavam was held beautifully

item.title: Feast of the Apostles – Peter & Paul
item.dc:creator: CML Nedungapra
item.description: Made posters for the Feast of the Apostles and presented them to the group to commemorate.
item.content:encoded: Made posters for the Feast of the Apostles and presented them to the group to commemorate.
